awards:
第76届戛纳电影节(2023)
　　金眼睛奖 特别提及
　　金眼睛奖 最佳纪录片(提名)
introduction: Afghan director Sahra Mani’s documentary Bread and Roses, capturing the experiences of Afghan women living under the Taliban since they took control of Kabul in 2021, was announced for its Official Selection on Monday.The film will screen as a Special Screening in the festival.The arrival of the Islamic fundamentalist Taliban movement in power has had a catastrophic impact on...
